name: Free Real Esnake
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2021 Submission by The HEAT Team.

Help mayor Sir Pentine develop the town of Serpendicular!

Slither around and gather resources by breaking rocks and trees in order to convert them into houses, but be careful, he's on a tight schedule and needs the housing to be as compact as possible!

This is the very first collaborative game most of our group has worked on, there's a couple more of us who don't have itch.io accounts that have worked on it as well.

Bug:Game.
